meanings.definition: Being in the age range of thirteen to nineteen.
meanings.sent1: The teenaged girl was excited about her upcoming birthday.
meanings.sent2: I remember my teenaged years as a time of growth and change.
meanings.sent3: The teenaged puppy was full of energy, just like a teenager!
meanings.sent4: Her teenaged mind was a whirlwind of emotions, much like a storm.
meanings.sent5: The teenaged trees swayed in the wind, symbolizing youth and vitality.

meanings.definition: A person who is between the ages of thirteen and nineteen.
meanings.sent1: The group of teenaged friends went to the movies together.
meanings.sent2: She was a typical teenaged, dealing with school and friendships.
meanings.sent3: The teenaged at the party was the life of the event, dancing and laughing.
meanings.sent4: As a teenaged, he felt the weight of both childhood and adulthood on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The teenaged in the mirror reflected back a mix of innocence and maturity.
